parameters.name: CategoryKey
parameters.description: The error message returned if the call fails.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the category that you want to query.

You can call the [ListThingTemplates](~~150316~~) operation and view all category keys in the response.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The error code returned if the call fails. For more information, see [Error codes](~~87387~~).
